alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 9:05PM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerous wind chills, snow, and blowing and drifting snow expected. Additional snowfall expected to range between a half inch and 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Indiana, Lagrange and Steuben Counties. In Michigan, Branch and Hillsdale Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Numerous crashes and road closures have been reported. Widespread blowing and drifting snow will significantly reduce visibility. Isolated power outages have been reported. The dangerously cold wind chills to 20 to 35 below zero will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...It will remain dangerously cold and windy with areas of blowing snow through Saturday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
